qas.question: A child opens a candy box and finds pencils inside. Later, another child who has not seen inside the box comes in. What will the second child think is in the box?
A child opens a toy egg and finds a rock inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the egg?
A child opens a juice box and finds crayons inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the box?
A child opens a chip bag and finds socks inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the bag?
A child opens a cookie tin and finds buttons inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the tin?
A child opens a cereal box and finds blocks inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the box?
A child opens a gift box and finds rocks inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the box?
A child opens a snack jar and finds paper inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the jar?
A child opens a milk carton and finds toys inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the carton?
A child opens a candy bag and finds coins inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the bag?
A child opens a pencil box and finds stickers inside. Another child who has not seen inside comes in. What will the second child think is in the box?
